title: "Performance Marketing Engine Wunderkind Raises $76M, With Focus On AI, Machine Learning"
excerpt: "Wunderkind, which helps brands target website visitors with emails and texts, has raised $76 million in funding, despite the ongoing controversy over ad targeting. CEO Bill Ingram says Wunderkind is making heavy investments in AI and machine learning."
